channel.title: Max Stat EXP question
channel.description:
If level 99 is 140000000 EXP how much EXP would the max stat level of 600 be?
Also I believe I heard the max stat level was 600 here and I'm not sure if that's true.
I'm taking the ::master command from the PhoneScape source files and transferring it over to the Testscape source files. I just put in 999999999 XP to give out when the code is entered, but that just glitched and gave me 0/99 stats and the total exp showed up as " * "

item.title: Max Stat EXP question
item.dc:creator: @ImmortalKaine ImmortalKaine
item.description:
@ImmortalKaine wrote:

Fuck you Ron… but thanks for the calcs

The only problem I have is Ill input the code for lvl 101 and my stats will all be level 0, I’ll hit level 0 combat and the total exp for each skill will be an asterisk *

Read full topic

item.title: Max Stat EXP question
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

ImmortalKaine, quit being a dick and stop fucking swearing.

–

Funny I recently finished a function that would do that.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

The answer to your question and many more is here. Here are all the lvls from 1 to 101. Even though 200 m exp is the highest you can get on rs high scores.

Level 1: 0 Level 2: 83 Level 3: 174 Level 4: 276 Level 5: 388 Level 6: 512 Level 7: 650 Level 8: 801 Level 9: 969 Level 10: 1154 Level 11: 1358 Level 12: 1584 Level 13: 1833 Level 14: 2107 Level 15: 2411 Level 16: 2746 Level 17: 3115 Level 18: 3523 Level 19: 3973 Level 20: 4470 Level 21: 5018 Level 22: 5624 Level 23: 6291 Level 24: 7028 Level 25: 7842 Level 26: 8740 Level 27: 9730 Level 28: 10824 Level 29: 12031 Level 30: 13363 Level 31: 14833 Level 32: 16456 Level 33: 18247 Level 34: 20224 Level 35: 22406 Level 36: 24815 Level 37: 27473 Level 38: 30408 Level 39: 33648 Level 40: 37224 Level 41: 41171 Level 42: 45529 Level 43: 50339 Level 44: 55649 Level 45: 61512 Level 46: 67983 Level 47: 75127 Level 48: 83014 Level 49: 91721 Level 50: 101333 Level 51: 111945 Level 52: 123660 Level 53: 136594 Level 54: 150872 Level 55: 166636 Level 56: 184040 Level 57: 203254 Level 58: 224466 Level 59: 247886 Level 60: 273742 Level 61: 302288 Level 62: 333804 Level 63: 368599 Level 64: 407015 Level 65: 449428 Level 66: 496254 Level 67: 547953 Level 68: 605032 Level 69: 668051 Level 70: 737627 Level 71: 814445 Level 72: 899257 Level 73: 992895 Level 74: 1096278 Level 75: 1210421 Level 76: 1336443 Level 77: 1475581 Level 78: 1629200 Level 79: 1798808 Level 80: 1986068 Level 81: 2192818 Level 82: 2421087 Level 83: 2673114 Level 84: 2951373 Level 85: 3258594 Level 86: 3597792 Level 87: 3972294 Level 88: 4385776 Level 89: 4842295 Level 90: 5346332 Level 91: 5902831 Level 92: 6517253 Level 93: 7195629 Level 94: 7944614 Level 95: 8771558 Level 96: 9684577 Level 97: 10692629 Level 98: 11805606 Level 99: 13034431 Level 100: 14391160 Level 101: 15889109
